7-Zip Source Code
Version: 25.01
Downloaded: 2025-12-06
Source: https://www.7-zip.org/
License: LGPL + unRAR restriction

Note: The original repository contains the top-level `C/`, `CPP/`, and `Asm/` directories.
This project does not duplicate the full source here to avoid redundancy.
To include the 7-Zip source in-tree, copy the existing `C/` and `CPP/` folders
from the workspace root into `libsevenzip/third_party/7zip/`.
